archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1171
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Foundation Partner I want to be able to limit the websites accessible from kids plan.

properties.value: Is this the part of kids plan? there may be different limitations defined, but preferrably not configured by Foundation Partner. To be checked by VF if this would be required (on LLD level).

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
